Nusphere Released Phped 4 6 The Top Ide For Php Developers

30 Aug 2006

NuSphere is pleased to announce immediate availability of PhpED version 4.6 and PhpED Standard version 4.6 with the whole array of New Features and New Pricing and Upgrades Model.\n

PhpED is the Integrated Development Environment for PHP, HTML, CSS, XML, SMARTY, XHTML and other.\nBalanced combination of advanced code editor, reliable dbg debugger, productive database connectivity client and fast and secure deployment abilities make PhpED a complete solution for most sophisticated developer needs.

\nPhpED Version 4 family has been widely accepted by PHP development community as the IDE of choice for Speed, Debugger and Fully Configurable Native User Interface.
NuSphere's customer Christoph Gonner (PIXEL-Boutique.de ~ advanced it-solutions) summarized his impressions of PhpED in one sentence: "Many features can be found in the other PHP-IDEs - in PhpED they are implemented that perfectly, that you can feel that this product was made by developers for developers."
